thread.title: BA to launch new Gatwick flight to Valencia

author: Buying Business Travel
title: BA to launch new Gatwick flight to Valencia
text:
BA to launch new Gatwick flight to Valencia 0 comments Follow @BBT_online 
British Airways is to launch a new route from Gatwick to Valencia for the coming winter season. 
The route to Spainâ€™s third largest city will start on November 6 with four flights per week which will be increased to six per week for the summer 2016 season.
